content: this crochet christmas gift card holder pattern adds a touch of whimsy to any gift card this is the thirty-first pattern in the third annual giftstravaganza blog hop 1 33 days of free crochet patterns for holiday gifts made with 3 skeins or less of yarn plus the chance to win one of 11 great prizes > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting flat in row changing colors crocheting over yarn tails seaming with single_crochet slip_stitch and whipstitch seams includes video tutorials in pattern crocheting in the back loop starting with a magic magic_ring includes links to video tutorials special stitch pattern invdec includes written description and link to video in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** to fit a standard gift card measuring approximately 3 375 8 5 cm x 2 125 5 5 cm **materials** big twist value 3 yarn 100% acrylic 6 oz/170 g 380 yd/347 m 1 skein each in ivory ca varsity red cb cream cc and varsity green cd *or approximately 5 yd 4 5 m in ca 30 yd 27 5 m in cb 10 yd 9 m in cc and 20 yd 18 5 m in cd in any medium weight yarn* tulip etimo 4 us size g-6/4 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge* yarn needle locking stitch marker fiber filling 5 **gauge** 10 single_crochet = 2 5 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern stitches should be small so fabric is stiff * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/10/31/2024-giftstravaganza-blog-hop/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/11/30/elf-gnome-crochet-christmas-gift-card-holder-pattern/ 3 https //prf hn/l/vxgmwlk 4 https //prf hn/l/ejnl40n/ 5 https //prf hn/l/4p4negw
